bags-page.paragraph-one: It's cheapest to buy your bags now. Avoid paying more at the airport.
bags-page.modal-body: You really don't need bags? If you change your mind, they'll only be more expensive at the airport.
bags-page.legal-text2: **The following items are not counted as carry-on items: umbrella, assistive device, outer garments (Coats/hats/wraps), camera, car seat/stroller, infant diaper bag, medicine, pet container, reading material for the flight, or food for immediate consumption. More information
bags-page.legal-text3: Certain embargo restrictions may apply depending on destination. All bag fees are non-refundable
